subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Jo-Wilfried Tsonga beat his fellow Frenchman Gilles Simon, 7-6 (5), to win the Open de Moselle for a record third time in Metz, France.
snippet: Jo-Wilfried Tsonga beat his fellow Frenchman Gilles Simon, 7-6 (5), to win the Open de Moselle for a record third time in Metz, France.
